text:
e="preserve">Metropolitan Vladimir (Volodymyr; secular name Viktor Markianovich Sabodan,, November 23, 1935-5 July, 2014) was a Ukrainian religious leader. He was the head of the Ukrainian Orthodox Church (Moscow Patriarchate) (UOC-MP) 1992-2014.
He died on July 5, 2014 from internal bleeding at the age of 78.
